Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-9390 affecting package vim for versions less than 9.1.1616-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-9390 affecting package vim for versions less than 9.1.1616-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package vim is earlier than 9.1.1616-1, affected by CVE-2025-9390
